detail.name: Classic Series 42 Inch Wide 24.5 Cu. Ft. Panel Ready Side By Side Refrigerator with French Door and Internal Water Dispenser
detail.description:
Features:

  • 24.5 cu. ft. capacity and layout meet the needs of today's homes
  • LED lighting illuminates interior for better viewing of contents
  • Delivers fresh, filtered water through an internal dispenser designed to discreetly rest within the refrigerator
  • Adjustable shelves allow you to customize storage space to meet your needs
  • Keeps produce fresher with high-humidity, sealed crisper and deli drawers
  • Monitor and control remotely with Wi-Fi connectivity
  • Accepts custom panels for an integrated look within cabinetry or stainless-steel accessory panels and handles to match other Sub-Zero, Wolf, and Cove products
  • Covered under 2 year, 5 year sealed system, and 12 year limited sealed system manufacturer warranties

Specifications:

  • Refrigerator Capacity: 15.6 Cu. Ft.
  • Freezer Capacity: 8.9 Cu. Ft.
  • Total Capacity: 24.5 Cu. Ft.
  • Bulb Type: LED
  • Counter Depth: Yes
  • Crisper Bins: Yes
  • Gallon Door Storage: No
  • Depth: 24"
  • Height: 84"
  • Width: 42"
  • Amperage: 15A
  • Voltage: 115V

ada.description: Whether this product is certified as meeting the guidelines set forth by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), which allow users with physical or other disabilities to use the product independently.

certifications.description: The certifications this product has received.

collection.description: A manufacturer's grouping of items that match, coordinate, or complement each other.

country_of_origin.description: The country of manufacture or assembly for the product, before it was shipped to the USA for sale.

height.description: The vertical measurement from bottom to top, measured in inches.

installation_type.description: The intended configuration for the products installed application as determined by the manufacturer.

made_in_america.description: Whether this product was manufactured in the United States of America.

manufacturer_warranty.description: The terms and conditions of the warranty provided for the product from the manufacturer.
manufacturer_warranty.value: 12 Year Limited Sealed System, 2 Year, 5 Year Sealed System

width.description: The horizontal measurement from left to right, measured in inches.

depth.description: The distance from the back of the product to the front of the product, measured in inches.

voltage.description: The electrical requirement to power this product, measured in volts.

amperage.description: The strength of the electrical current that will be drawn by this product, measured in amperes.

bulb_type.description: The type of light bulb included.

energy_star.description: The product has been independently certified to ensure it meets ENERGY STAR's requirements.

features.name: Cutout Depth
features.description: The horizontal distance from back to front of the cutout that's needed to properly install the product, measured in inches.

features.name: Cutout Height
features.description: The vertical distance from bottom to top of the cutout that's needed to properly install the product, measured in inches.

features.name: Cutout Width
features.description: The horizontal distance from left to right of the cutout that's needed to properly install the product, measured in inches.

features.name: Depth
features.description: The distance from the back of the product to the front of the product, measured in inches.

features.name: Depth with Door Open
features.description: The measurement from back to front with the door open, measured in inches.

features.name: Depth without Door
features.description: The measurement from back to front without the door installed, measured in inches.

features.name: Depth without Handles
features.description: The measurement from back to front without the handle(s) installed, measured in inches.

features.name: Freezer Capacity
features.description: The storage capacity of the product's freezer, measured in cubic feet.

features.name: Height
features.description: The vertical measurement from bottom to top, measured in inches.

features.name: Height to Top of Case
features.description: The height of the product to the top of its case, measured in inches.

features.name: Nominal Depth
features.description: The depth of the product rounded to the nearest industry standard size, measured in inches.

features.name: Nominal Height
features.description: The height of the product rounded to the nearest industry standard size, measured in inches.

features.name: Nominal Width
features.description: The overall horizontal left to right measurement rounded to the nearest industry standard size, measured in inches.

features.name: Product Weight
features.description: The actual weight of the product without any shipping materials, measured in pounds.

features.name: Refrigerator Capacity
features.description: The capacity of the product's refrigerated fresh food storage space, measured in cubic feet.

features.name: Total Capacity
features.description: The total dimensional size and space of the interior or storage portion of the product, measured in cubic feet.

features.name: Width
features.description: The horizontal measurement from left to right, measured in inches.

features.name: Dispenser Features
features.description: Whether or not the product features an ice and/or water dispenser and whether it is located in the interior or exterior of the product.

features.name: Humidity Control
features.description: Whether the product features humidity control.

features.name: Ice Maker
features.description: Whether an ice maker is included.

features.name: Includes Freezer
features.description: Whether a freezer is included.

features.name: App Compatibility
features.description: The smartphone app(s) the product is compatible with.

features.name: Bulb Type
features.description: The type of light bulb included.

features.name: Control Type
features.description: Indicates how the user will control the operational features for this product.

features.name: Counter Depth
features.description: Whether the product is considered to align with standard depth kitchen cabinets / counters to create a more flush or seamless look when installed.

features.name: Defrost Type
features.description: Indicates if the freezer has an automatic or semi-automatic defrost feature, or if frost removal must be completed manually by the owner.

features.name: Display Type
features.description: The type of display this product has.

features.name: Door Features
features.description: Distinctive attributes or aspects of the product's door.

features.name: Door Swing
features.description: The direction the door will swing when opening.

features.name: Fingerprint Resistant
features.description: Finish will resist fingerprints and other smudges.

features.name: Frost Free
features.description: Frost free is the popular term used for a refrigerator/freezer that includes an automatic defrost system. If a refrigerator/freezer specifies that it has an automatic defrost system, it will also be considered "frost free", as the defroster will prevent the build up of any frost within the unit.

features.name: Installation Type
features.description: The intended configuration for the products installed application as determined by the manufacturer.

features.name: Number Of Shelves
features.description: The total number of shelves included.

features.name: Panel Ready
features.description: A panel ready product allows for a custom cover (generally a cabinet panel on an appliance) to be installed on the face or the front of the product. For example, this would allow for a panel-ready refrigerator to match the existing kitchen cabinets for a consistent and streamlined look across the whole kitchen or for a personalized look that can be refined as often as desired.

features.name: Refrigerant
features.description: The type of refrigerant used by the product in its cooling functions.

features.name: Sabbath Mode
features.description: Whether this product includes a Sabbath mode feature.

features.name: Shelf Type (Freezer)
features.description: The type of shelves used in the product's freezer.

features.name: Shelf Type (Refrigerator)
features.description: The type of shelves used in the product's refrigerator.

features.name: Smart Home
features.description: Whether a product is classified as a smart product. Smart products allow the product to be connected and controlled by smart devices such as phones, tablets, or other compatible devices.

features.name: Storage Features
features.value: Adjustable Shelves, Crisper Bin, Ice Bin
features.description: Distinctive attributes or aspects of the product's storage.

features.name: Wireless Communication
features.description: The wireless protocols that this device uses to communicate with other wireless devices on the same network such as Wi-Fi or Bluetooth.

features.name: With Casters
features.description: Whether the product comes with casters. Casters are wheels mounted in such a way to allow free 360 degree movement for easier transportation of the product.

features.name: Amperage
features.description: The strength of the electrical current that will be drawn by this product, measured in amperes.

features.name: Annual Energy Consumption (kWh)
features.description: The annual energy consumption of the product, measured in kilowatt hours.

features.name: Frequency
features.description: The number of cycles per second of alternating current (AC), measured in Hertz.

features.name: Voltage
features.description: The electrical requirement to power this product, measured in volts.

features.name: ADA
features.description: Whether this product is certified as meeting the guidelines set forth by the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA), which allow users with physical or other disabilities to use the product independently.

features.name: Annual Operation Cost
features.description: The annual cost to operate the product, measured in U.S. dollars.

features.name: Approved for Commercial Use
features.description: Whether this product is rated for use in commercial applications.

features.name: Certifications
features.description: The certifications this product has received.

features.name: Collection
features.description: A manufacturer's grouping of items that match, coordinate, or complement each other.

features.name: Country Of Origin
features.description: The country of manufacture or assembly for the product, before it was shipped to the USA for sale.

features.name: Energy Star
features.description: The product has been independently certified to ensure it meets ENERGY STAR's requirements.

features.name: Lead Leaching Certified NSF/ANSI 61
features.description: Whether this product is has been tested by a third party laboratory and certified as meeting the Lead Leaching Standards outlined in NSF/ANSI 61. The regulation also states that the product packaging must be marked to identify compliance.

features.name: Made in America
features.description: Whether this product was manufactured in the United States of America.

features.name: Manufacturer Warranty
features.value: 12 Year Limited Sealed System, 2 Year, 5 Year Sealed System
features.description: The terms and conditions of the warranty provided for the product from the manufacturer.

features.name: Outdoor Approved
features.description: Whether the product can be used, stored, and/or installed in an environment exposed to outside conditions and elements.

features.name: Title 20 Compliant
features.description: Whether this product is Title 20 compliant as listed by the Appliance Efficiency Program.
